extendedInfo.description: Enjoy the convenience, security and ease of doing your banking right from your mobile device. You can check your account balances, transfer funds, view recent activity, receive alerts, find ATMs or banking centers - even make check deposits from your phone.To get started, download and launch the app. Then sign on with your Southern Commerce Bank Online Banking Access ID and Password. Itâs that simple.Monitor Your Account - See account balances and transaction historyPerform Transactions- Pay bills- Transfer money between Southern Commerce Bank accounts- Place a stop paymentMake Check Deposits- Make check deposits with your phone Find Branch Locations and ATMs- Find the nearest Southern Commerce Bank banking center locations & ATMs- Speak with a bank representativeAlerts- Balance level alerts:  let you know when you have gone above or dipped below your pre-selected amount. - Transaction alerts:  let you know when specific transaction activity occurs on your account. - Scheduled alerts:  send you the latest information on your available balance and recent account history.Safe and SecureSouthern Commerce Bank is committed to your security and protecting the privacy of your financial information. We use state of the art technology to protect unauthorized access to your account, your wireless communication is securely encrypted, and your personal information is not stored on your phone. Have Questions?  Call 1-866-868-1919 Southern Commerce Bank â Member FDIC

reviews.title: Can\'t deposit!
reviews.comment: The app is a great concept but the mobile deposit feature is horrible.  I have a great camera with my phone but the app us unable to capture a clear and readable image of the check despite me being able to do it without problem through the camera app.    If they fix the picture focus capability for deposits this will be a 5 star app.
reviews.author: Jessica Fox

reviews.title: Nightmare
reviews.comment: This bank sucks. Customer service sucks and the mobile app sucks. They held my paycheck for a week...(still holding it) I keep calling and getting different ppl telling me different things. The wait time to speak with someone is no less than 15 mins Every time
reviews.author: kia m

reviews.comment: Is a great bank thank u so much

reviews.title: Scott
reviews.comment: I have PROOF they will RIP YOU OFF using this app !! I made a amazon purchase on the 2nd the app shows it came out on the 4th then I overdraw my account & they pushed the amazon purchase back to the 6th so they could bounce my account twice !!! Well I got the pics to PROVE they purposely RIPPED ME OFF !!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I can\'t even deposit my check on there. Horrible quality and my Samsungs camera is awesome. Worthless app
